net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.inline
Class TableInlineTaglet

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.impl.AbstractSimpleTaglet
      net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.impl.TextFilterTaglet
          net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.inline.TextFilterInlineTaglet
              net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.inline.ParamInlineTaglet
                  net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.inline.TableInlineTaglet
All Implemented Interfaces:
InlineTaglet, SimpleTaglet
public class TableInlineTaglet
extends ParamInlineTaglet

Taglet to create tabular data.

This inline taglet may be used to define a regular M*N table.

Table Tag Syntax

{@table [noheader] [nofill]
  || header 1 | header 2 | ... | header N ||
  || cell 1/1 | cell 1/2 | ... | cell 1/N ||
  || cell 2/1 | cell 2/2 | ... | cell 2/N ||
  ...
  || cell M/1 | cell M/2 | ... | cell M/N ||
}

Example with header:

header 1 header 2 header 3 header 4 header 5
cell 1/1 cell 1/2 cell 1/3 cell 1/4 cell 1/5
cell 2/1 cell 2/2 cell 2/3 cell 2/4 cell 2/5
cell 3/1 cell 3/2 cell 3/3 cell 3/4 cell 3/5
cell 4/1 cell 4/2 cell 4/3 cell 4/4 cell 4/5

Example without header:

cell 1/1 cell 1/2 cell 1/3 cell 1/4 cell 1/5
cell 2/1 cell 2/2 cell 2/3 cell 2/4 cell 2/5
cell 3/1 cell 3/2 cell 3/3 cell 3/4 cell 3/5
cell 4/1 cell 4/2 cell 4/3 cell 4/4 cell 4/5

Examples that doesn't fill the whole document width:

header 1 header 2 header 3 header 4 header 5
cell 1/1 cell 1/2 cell 1/3 cell 1/4 cell 1/5
cell 2/1 cell 2/2 cell 2/3 cell 2/4 cell 2/5
cell 3/1 cell 3/2 cell 3/3 cell 3/4 cell 3/5
cell 4/1 cell 4/2 cell 4/3 cell 4/4 cell 4/5

Combined without header:

cell 1/1 cell 1/2 cell 1/3 cell 1/4 cell 1/5
cell 2/1 cell 2/2 cell 2/3 cell 2/4 cell 2/5
cell 3/1 cell 3/2 cell 3/3 cell 3/4 cell 3/5
cell 4/1 cell 4/2 cell 4/3 cell 4/4 cell 4/5

Version:

splitRows

protected String[] splitRows(String tag)
Split the specified table tag content into rows.

The row delimiter used is ROW_DELIMITER.

Parameters:

Returns:
an array of rows.

configure

public void configure(Logger logger,
                      Configuration configuration)
Configures the table taglet and determines the table class to use.

Info:

Set the parameter "class" to the desired table class. Defaults to "doc".
